content: 1dc in ch1 next 8 single_crochet ch3 sk3 single_crochet single_crochet in each of the next 5 single_crochet turn space 1dc in each of the 3 double_crochet at center of 5dc 3 buttonholes worked group repeat from * to ch3 1dc ch1 1dc in top row 6 ch1 single_crochet in each st across turn 34 single_crochet repeat row 6 ~ 3 more times of ch3 turn finishing row 3 ch3 2dc in ch1 space * 1dc ch1 1dc in fasten_off yarn center of 3dc group 5dc in ch1 space repeat from weave in ends * to ch3 1dc ch1 1dc in top of ch3 turn wet block your cowl when cowl is dry sew on buttons spaced to row 4 ch3 1dc in ch1 space *3dc in center of 5dc match the buttonholes group 1dc ch1 1dc in ch1 space repeat from * to last double_crochet 1dc in last double_crochet double_crochet in top of ch3 turn abbreviations row 5 ch3 1dc in next double_crochet *5dc in ch1 space 1dc ch1 1dc in center of 3dc group repeat from * to ch3 3dc in top of ch3 turn chain chain repeat row 2 to 5 until cowl is desired length single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet palm leaves multiple of 3 + 1 st s stitch es skip skip row 1 using hook size f 3 75mm ch1 *single_crochet ch2 vst half_double_crochet ch1 half_double_crochet in same stitch sk2 repeat from * to last single_crochet single_crochet turn row 2 ch3 1dc in next single_crochet *3dc in next single_crochet repeat from * to last single_crochet 2dc in single_crochet turn row 3 ch1 single_crochet in next double_crochet *ch2 single_crochet in middle double_crochet of group repeat from * to beginning ch3 ch2 single_crochet in top of ch3 repeat row 2 and 3 until cowl is desired length designsbycherylchow@gmail com all images and text © designs by cheryl chow llc 2013
